title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers

Transform your living space with the luxurious GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers are incredibly soft and comfortable, perfect for snuggling up on the couch or bed. The elegant gold color adds a touch of sophistication to any room.

This 2 pack of 18x18 inch pillow covers is tailor-made for your comfort, with an invisible zipper closure for a seamless look. Whether you're lounging in the living room, relaxing in bed, or adding a pop of style to your office or car, these covers are versatile for any space.

And the best part? These pillow covers are machine washable, making maintenance a breeze. Simply wash in cold water and dry on a low temperature for lasting quality.
